verbs.description: [ARG0: russian hackers] [V: hunted] [ARG1: journalists] [ARGM-TMP: in years - long campaign] russian television anchor pavel lobkov was in the studio getting ready for his show when jarring news flashed across his phone some of his most intimate messages had fancy bear john podesta new yorker paris moscow hillary rodham clinton plymouth government of russia brookings institution pavel lobkov
